author: admin
title: Talon Launches CloudFAST for Azure File Storage at AzureCon
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 12:00 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Talon Storage 
MOUNT LAUREL, NJ -- (Marketwired) -- 09/29/15 -- Talon , the leading provider of Microsoft File Aware application performance intelligent file caching solutions for distributed enterprise infrastructure, today announced the general availability of its newest solution, CloudFAST for Azure File Storage, at AzureCon , one of the world's largest online virtual events, held by Microsoft Corp. 
Talon's CloudFAST enables distributed enterprises to centralize and help secure file data into Azure File Storage, creating real-time global file sharing and collaboration with central file locking, a key consideration when managing file level data. With CloudFAST, enterprises can achieve a highly scalable, and low cost alternative to on-premises datacenter infrastructure, while ensuring full Microsoft integration with Microsoft Azure Active Directory, NTFS security, ACLs, and SMB. 
"Microsoft is an exceptional, focused leader in the world of global cloud infrastructure," said Andrew Mullen, SVP, Sales and Marketing, Talon. "Talon fully supports Microsoft's approach to file sharing and we're excited to debut our latest offering, CloudFAST to the audience at AzureCon." 
Talon leverages its unique 'Intelligent File Caching' for enterprise branch offices, caching data only when it is active. CloudFAST deployment on Windows Server and Hyper-V in the branch is transparent, easy to manage, and extensible. Azure runs on a worldwide network of Microsoft-managed datacenters across 24 regions, allowing for a massive scale for global organizations. 
Jason Hogg, Principal PM Manager, Microsoft Azure Storage, explained, "Talon's leading-edge enterprise file sharing and collaboration solution CloudFAST for Azure File Storage helps customers address challenges related to distributed file sharing, whilst making optimal use of Microsoft Azure and Windows based infrastructures." 
AzureCon is a free, all-virtual event with over 250,000 customers, partners and technologists in attendance. Attendees will hear from experts about the latest Azure innovations and easy-to-adopt solutions. 50 technical sessions will be held to help attendees accelerate their adoption of the cloud. 
Talon's CloudFAST is available from the Microsoft Azure Marketplace (BYOL and user-based).
